phrase.text: A settlement's loyalty defines the speed with which it can be captured.\n\nWhilst your warriors shout in front of the building, the settlement's loyalty will decrease. Once it reaches zero, the settlement will be yours.
The presence of allied warriors nearby increases the loyalty of a settlement, so it might be impossible for you to capture it if there are lots of enemies nearby.

When you select a building, you can see its icon and name in the information section, in the upper part of the screen.\n\nUnderneath the name, you'll find its current population and the loyalty. Once in control of a settlement, you'll also be able to see the amount of food and gold that it has stored inside.
